## PopulatableProtocol.liquidateUpTo() method

Liquidate the least collateralized Troves up to a maximum number.

**Signature:**

```typescript
liquidateUpTo(maximumNumberOfTrovesToLiquidate: number): Promise<PopulatedTransactionInterface<P, SentProtocolTransaction<S, ProtocolReceipt<R, LiquidationDetails>>>>;
```
